document_data.name: ''Ripper''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rippers''''' were ancient [[enchanted]] [[longbow]]s that were once wielded by [[half-elven]] scouts in [[Anauroch]].
document_data.Powers: These bows possessed ''+3'' enchantments and had the capability of delivering devastatingly mighty shots. Additionally, ''Rippers'' made their wielders immune to any mind-affecting abilities and [[spell]]s.
document_data.History: The name of the master who crafted these longbows was long forgotten. Many ''Rippers'' were lost, stolen, and destroyed. By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], only a handful of ''Rippers'' were known to exist and a few could be found on the [[Sword Coast]], in the city of [[Neverwinter]], and in [[Elventree]] in the [[Moonsea]] region.
